STEPS.STEP: Dice chicken then chop onion and crush garlic.

Heat the oil in a pan and fry onion and garlic over a medium heat till softened. Mix the chilli powder, turmeric and a pinch of salt together in a bowl then add the chicken pieces and mix well to coat, add chicken to pan and fry for 10-15 mins until golden brown.

Stir the tomatoes, ginger, cumin and coriander into the pan then reduce heat until the mixture is simmering, cook for 20-30 mins stirring occasionally and adding a tablespoon of water if the mixture seems too dry. Meanwhile cook the rice. Then stir in the butter to the chicken and add lemon juice to taste.
Serve and garnish with lime wedges, red chillies and coriander.
